title: Salmon fillets, spiced kale & white beans

ingredients.item: 150g pack Pentland Brig kale, thick stalks removed, leaves shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and cook the salmon fillets, skin-side down, for 7 minutes until crisped. Turn the fillets, cook for 1 minute and transfer to a plate.

Add the salad onions to the pan and cook for 3 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for 1 minute. Stir in the beans, zaatar, stock pot and 400ml water. Heat until simmering. Stir in the kale and cook gently for 10 minutes until the juices have thickened and the kale is tender.
Return the salmon to the pan and cook, covered, for 3 minutes or until the fish is thoroughly cooked through, pink and opaque.
